links.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway increases Apple position by 5 percent
links.description: Financial mogul Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway loaded up on shares of Apple in the second quarter of 2018, increasing the fund's position to nearly 252 million shares at the end of the three-month period.

links.title: Lotte Retreats From China as Beijing-Seoul Dispute Dents Business
links.description: SEOUL-South Korean conglomerate Lotte Group is conceding defeat for its Lotte Mart business in China, with plans to sell stores there after heavy losses brought on by diplomatic tensions between Seoul and Beijing.

links.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway reloads on Apple and Goldman Sachs
links.description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway increased its stake in Apple by 5 percent, according to a regulatory filing Tuesday that discloses positions through the end of the second quarter. Berkshire also increased its holdings of Goldman Sachs by 21 percent, Delta by 18.8 percent and Southwest by 18.7 percent, the filing said.
